text:
I'm glad to see some Pok√©tubers actually dare to rant on a game instead of just announcing how every freaking Pok√©mon game is a gift from Arceus, because they know there target audience are (die hard) Pok√©mon fans.

It's a disgrace that TPC releases a remake of a Pok√©mon game that doesn't add anything new, besides the small quality-of-life improvements that were already introduced in previous games.
You could still argue that it's a remake for newer Pok√©mon fans who weren't able to play the original games yet, and want to experience it on the Switch.
But even then, not all features from the original games are in the remake. The GTS still isn't functioning, even when players already switched to Arceus and are already eagerly hoping Gen9 will be announced and release at the end of the year.
To top this off, they dare to ask people to pay 60 bucks for this game...

I'm enjoying Arceus at the moment. It's not perfect, but it's fun and fresh. After SM/USUM/SWSH/BDSP, TPC/GameFreak has finally shown that they still are capable to deliver good games.
Let's hope they keep this momentum and finally give us the first decent mainline Pok√©mon game since the 3D era and not the abomination that is BDSP.

text:
I highly doubt Gen 9 is happening this year i would say 2023 or maybe even 2024, i might not be in the industry but i did take game development at college before going on to other courses so i have a bit of an understanding of what goes into game development. 
I look at what they have done since Gen 8 launched taking into account that they where working on Legends Arceus during a pandemic, then there is the fact they are still updating gen 8 games with a possible legends DLC in development. 
I would say that if they are even working on a gen 9 game it would not be that far along in development, even if they where to reuse legends engine they still need to work on things like, fixing any bugs/problems the engine had, change gameplay elements based on fan feedback from Legends Arceus, a lot of art assets would need to be made including pokemon/character models the region map and a lot of other art related things, and then they need to come up with a story and maybe even a gimmick along the lines of mega evolution, z-moves or dynamax.

The graphics are arguably amazing and the music provides a wave full of nostalgia. For you to complain about simple things such as bugs and glitches, it shows you never really cared for playing the remake and wanting to invest a lot of time into it.
author: Reaon

text:
¬†@Reaon¬† "the glitches and bugs only affect you if you apply them to your game"

What are you going on about? Are you saying that bugs and glitches don't exist unless I hack my game and put them there myself? Cause that is an extremely dumb statement. 

I experiences several bugs and glitches. The softlocke in Snowpoint gym. The graphical glitch of surfing after a battle. Having a shiny Pokemon grass patch spawn underneath an npc, making it impossible to encounter. The calculator on the Poketch is just completely broken.

And those were just he ones I experienced. And no...I didn't;t hack my game. Bugs like those exists becuase of the programmers. There's way more bugs and glitches than that. Having to constantly update your game becuase it's filled with bugs is ridiculous.

Just becuase you didn't;t experience any bugs, doesn't;t they they don't exists. Lots of people have experienced bugs and glitches in the game. That's why people are complaining.

These rakes offer barely anything new from the originals. In fact, there's a lot of content missing. Unlike HG/SS and ORAS that actually improved the game, added new mechanics, story, characters, etc. BDSP is a copy paste game. 

And no....having a game filled with bugs isn't "something simple". Some of these are literally a game-breaking. And you're now claiming that me pointing out bugs and glitches mean I suddenly never cared? What he fuck are you making baseless claims like that? Like..why are you making up bs like that? Are you just trying to get me angry to argue with you? Flat out accusing someone of that is just pathetic.

I literally said that I had fun with the game. I enjoyed it. But it didn't improve form the originals. It was filled with questionable decisions and bugs. For people who were waiting a long time for gen 4 remakes, and then not getting a true remake....it's a let down. Lots of people wanted an improved game. Not just graphics and nostalgia. Don't know why you're suddenly attacking me for pointing out the flaws of a game. Grow up.
